Once upon a time, there was a dog named Spot. Spot had a red collar that he wore all the time. One day, Spot went outside to play. He ran and ran until he saw a bird in the sky. The bird was flying so fast, it looked like it was going to zoom away. Spot barked and chased after the bird. But then, he got too close and the bird flew away. Spot was sad and went back home. When he got home, his owner was there and gave him a treat. The owner noticed that Spot's collar was dirty and harsh. So, the owner took off the collar and cleaned it. Spot was happy again and wagged his tail.

He roared loudly and scared all the animals.  The leopard was very hungry and wanted to eat something. He saw a little rabbit and chased it. The rabbit ran and ran, but the leopard was too fast. The leopard caught the rabbit and ate it all up.  The other animals wept and wept. They were sad that the leopard had eaten their friend. They wished the leopard had never come to their jungle. The end.

2.gold: 一日，一架大飛機喺天上飛。個速度好慢，好有耐性。飛機入面有好多人，佢哋都好開心好興奮。突然間，架飛機開始震。入面啲人開始驚慌失措。佢哋好驚，唔知點算好。個機長努力咁想令架飛機停低，但係好難。個機長好有耐性，唔會放棄。佢安慰啲人，叫佢哋唔好驚慌。過咗一陣，架飛機終於停低咗。啲人開心咗，安全咗。個機長係英雄，大家都感謝佢嘅耐心同勇氣。

Once upon a time there was a girl who was very honest. Her name was Jane. Jane loved to help her parents and friends whenever she could but she had a problem. Every day, she kept insisting that she needed more help! Her mother and father thought she was just being silly but her friends soon realised that Jane was being honest. So they started to help her more and take on some of the jobs she was asking them to do. Jane was very pleased that her friends were being so helpful. She kept insisting that they join her every day and help her out. She smiled and thanked them every time. And this was how Jane and her honest friends made sure she got all the help she needed.

Sara loved to visit her grandma on the farm. She liked to see the animals and help with the chores. Her favorite animal was the horse. His name was Brownie and he was big and strong and cheerful. He liked to run and jump and neigh. One day, Sara and her grandma made some bread and jam for lunch. Sara wanted to share some with Brownie. She took a slice of bread and spread some jam on it. She wrapped it in a napkin and ran to the barn. She found Brownie in his stall and gave him a hug. "Hello, Brownie," she said. "I have a treat for you. Do you want some bread and jam?" Brownie nodded and snorted. He took the bread from Sara's hand and ate it in one bite. He licked his lips and nuzzled Sara's cheek. He was happy and grateful. "Thank you, Sara," he said in his horse way. "That was yummy. You are very kind." Sara smiled and stroked his mane. She felt happy and proud. "You're welcome, Brownie," she said. "You are my best friend. I love you." They hugged and played for a while. Then Sara and Brownie went back to the house to join grandma for lunch. They had a cheerful day.

(i) 當日，有一隻頑固的小鳥。他喜歡棲息在最高枝上最高的樹上。有一天，突然，他感到地面在搖動。原來是地震！小鳥
199.gold: 從前有隻好頑固嘅細鳥，佢鍾意喺最高嘅樹枝頂上停低。有一日，突然間，佢感覺到地面在震動。係地震呀！隻鳥好驚，佢睜大咗雙眼。佢嘗試保持盡可能靜止。震動停止後，隻鳥再睜開眼睛，周圍望下。佢發現其他嘅鳥都飛走咗。但係隻頑固嘅細鳥就咁喺度，決心唔會驚地震。
